name: Interplanetary Warfare
description:
Mission Briefing

Our recon assets have detected a hostile space fighter. Your mission is to eliminate the enemy fighter and to stay alive. We have also detected an anti-shipping mine in your patrol sector so be careful.

Buck One (Player 1) Controls:

Accelerate: W

Rotate Clockwise: Q

Rotate Counter-Clockwise: E

Break: Z

Primary Weapon: F

Buck Two (Player 2) Controls:

Accelerate: Up Arrow

Rotate Clockwise: Left Arrow

Rotate Counter-Clockwise: Right Arrow

Break: Right Shift

Primary Weapon: "

-NOTE-

This is my first game so please feel free to rip it apart and or give me tips on how to improve it.
